column5: Viper is a shag that comes in a vibrant range of colours to give a funky look and feel.
column7: Non-shedding; every one is unique; thick dense pile; vibrant colours; antistatic; easy to clean.
column13: Regular vacuuming required. Professional cleaning recommended. Do not use a power or rotary head vacuum cleaner. Do not pull at fibres. Any spills should be blotted up immediately. Keep out of direct sunlight.
